summary: Latest News! - OXO Network Listed on CoinMarketCap - OXO Network is a blockchain project aiming to provide a fast and secure Ethereum Virtual Machine (EVM) compatible blockchain. It will operate as a layer 1 blockchain with Proof-of-Stake (PoS) consensus, offering increased scalability, efficiency, and environmental friendliness compared to traditional Proof-of-Work (PoW) blockchains.
proposal:
Greetings OXO Network community! 🚀

I see you guys are making waves on CoinMarketCap, congrats on the listing! Your project's vision to provide a fast and secure EVM-compatible blockchain is commendable, we love the efficiency and environmental friendliness you're bringing to the table!

Our shop shares similar values and is all about supporting communities like yours. We have a toolbox full of B2B solutions that can be deployed by anyone from the community. Think of us as the IKEA of blockchain tools, but without the confusing assembly instructions. 😅

We have a range of tools that can be tailored to fit your project's needs:

1. 🔄 DEX (UNI FACTORY): Create your own DEX based on Uniswap V2.
2. 🎰 Lottery: Implement a blockchain-based lottery and earn up to 30% commission.
3. 🪙 Wallet: Create a multicurrency crypto wallet.
4. 🌾 Farming: Set up ERC20 Staking & Yield Farming.
5. 🗳 DAO: Establish governance and proposals for your OXO token.
6. 🌉 CrossChain: Create an EVM compatible blockchain bridge.
7. 🚀 IDOFactory - Launchpad: Launchpad solution for IDO pools and token locking.

And the best part? Most of these tools are available at $0 cost, you only share a portion of the revenue you generate. 

We're not here to play games, we're here to help you create them. Interested in exploring these tools further? Let's chat! 👋

Check out our demo here: https://t.me/onoutdemos

P.S. If our tools were listed on CoinMarketCap, we're confident we'd be giving Bitcoin a run for its money. 😜
